price: 75. (Cadaab)kaasi waxaa idiinku wacan waxaad ugu farxi jirteen dhulka dhexdiisa xaq darro iyo waxaad la kibri jirteen.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَمۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum bimā kuntum tafraḥūna fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi wabimā kuntum tamraḥūna
